import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import Footer from'../footer/Footer';import'./MenuPage.scss';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MenuPage=_ref=>{let{setCart}=_ref;const[menu,setMenu]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/menu").then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setMenu(data)).catch(error=>console.log(error));},[]);const addToCart=item=>{setCart(oldCart=>[...oldCart,item]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"menu-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Menu"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"menu-wrapper",children:menu.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"price",children:["Price: $",item.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(item),className:"add-to-cart",children:"Add to Cart"})]})]},item.id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default MenuPage;
